column4: I can't login anymore after installing 12.04 and keeping my /home partition. anyone has a clue how to fix this?
What kind of error do you see?
cap can't see any errors, they are disappearing instantly
login into guest account works fine
Do you have a user set up for /home/matc21  (with same name?)
yes same name, even the same password
What happens when you boot the system?  What do you see on the screen?
booting is perfectly fine, it just goes back to lightDM
what is "lightDM"
the login manager
So can you type in the name of the user?
yes, even the password...then I press login, screen goes black and back to login again
!password | matc21
its definitely not a wrong password
Ctrl-ALt-F6   and login
lemme try
brb
F6 mode works fine
can login without problems
Well, https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/lightdm/+bug/902698 or https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/lightdm/+bug/903299 or  https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/lightdm/+bug/973184
Do permissions look ok in your /home/matc21 directory?
